decks.notes: This deck focuses on controlling the game through a combination of disruption and removal spells, while utilizing efficient creatures to apply pressure on the opponent's life total. Raffine, Scheming Seer leads the way as the commander, providing card advantage and utility. The deck includes a mix of counterspells like Force of Will and Mana Leak, along with removal spells like Fatal Push and Swords to Plowshares to deal with threats. Efficient creatures like Brazen Borrower and True-Name Nemesis help to apply pressure and close out games quickly. Overall, the key strategy is to disrupt the opponent's game plan, maintain control of the board, and finish off the opponent with aggressive creatures.

This deck focuses on a fast-paced, aggressive strategy that aims to overwhelm the opponent quickly. It utilizes low-cost creatures and efficient removal spells to control the board and push for damage. The commanders Far Traveler and Gut, True Soul Zealot provide additional support and can help maintain pressure on the opponent. By curving out with aggressive creatures like Goblin Guide, Kari Zev, Skyship Raider, and Legion Loyalist, the deck can quickly chip away at the opponent's life total. Additionally, cards like Lightning Bolt, Swords to Plowshares, and Skyclave Apparition provide efficient removal options to clear the way for attacks. Overall, the key concept of this deck is to be proactive and maintain constant pressure on the opponent to secure a victory.

This deck focuses on controlling the board and disrupting the opponent's strategy while building up a strong offense. It includes a variety of counterspells, removal spells, and disruptive creatures to deal with threats. The commander, Raffine, Scheming Seer, provides card advantage and can help dig for key pieces of the deck. The deck also includes efficient creatures with powerful abilities such as Hullbreacher and True-Name Nemesis to pressure the opponent. The mana base is carefully constructed to support the deck's color requirements and provide flexibility in casting spells. Overall, the key concept of this deck is to maintain control of the game through disruption and build a strong board presence to close out the game quickly.

The deck focuses on aggressive gameplay, utilizing direct damage spells and powerful creatures to quickly defeat the opponent. It includes a mix of removal spells, discard spells, and threats to disrupt the opponent's game plan while putting pressure on them. The commander, Flamewar, Brash Veteran, supports this strategy by providing additional damage and card advantage. The deck also includes graveyard recursion and card draw to maintain momentum. The mana base is optimized for consistency and includes various utility lands to support the aggressive game plan. Overall, the deck aims to control the battlefield and secure a swift victory through overwhelming offense.

The deck is focused on maintaining a fast tempo and aggressive playstyle, utilizing a combination of low-cost creatures with abilities that help maintain board presence and disrupt opponents. The key strategy revolves around efficient removal spells like Lightning Bolt and Fatal Push to control the board while deploying creatures like Knight of the Ebon Legion and Bloodghast to continually pressure the opponent. The inclusion of cards like Demonic Tutor and Demonic Consultation allows for consistency in finding key pieces like Embercleave for burst damage. By applying early pressure and leveraging powerful cards like Juri, Master of the Revue, the deck aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent and secure a swift victory.

The key concept of this deck is to utilize the Old Stickfingers commander in a Combo strategy to quickly assemble powerful card combinations and win conditions. The deck includes a wide range of cards focused on graveyard manipulation, tutoring, and disruption to control the game while setting up game-ending combos. With access to powerful spells like Demonic Tutor, Yawgmoth's Will, and Reanimate, the deck can quickly find necessary combo pieces and overwhelm opponents. Cards like Tendrils of Agony and Exhume provide alternate win conditions, ensuring that the deck has multiple paths to victory. Additionally, the inclusion of disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Abrupt Decay helps the deck interact with and disrupt opponents' game plans.

The deck focuses on aggressive gameplay with a mix of creatures and spells to quickly deal damage to the opponent. The commanders Bruse Tarl and Yoshimaru provide a strong attacking presence and support for the aggro strategy. The deck includes a variety of efficient creatures like Isamaru, Hound of Konda, Kari Zev, Skyship Raider, and Squee, Dubious Monarch, along with powerful removal spells such as Lightning Bolt and Swords to Plowshares. Additionally, the deck features equipment like Embercleave and Shadowspear to enhance creature capabilities and finish off opponents. The mana base is optimized for consistent access to the deck's powerful threats and spells, ensuring a fast and relentless assault on the opponent.

This deck focuses on utilizing the powerful abilities of Aragorn, King of Gondor, to lead an aggressive strategy in a Duel Commander format. The deck includes a wide range of spells and creatures to control the board and deal damage to the opponent quickly. With a mix of removal spells like Swords to Plowshares and Lightning Bolt, along with counterspells like Force of Will and Spell Pierce, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while maintaining pressure with evasive creatures like True-Name Nemesis and Spectral Adversary. The mana base is carefully constructed to support the deck's color requirements and ensure consistency in casting spells at various points in the game.

The main focus of this deck is to aggressively attack the opponent using a mix of creatures and burn spells, while also maintaining control over the game with counterspells and card advantage. Utilizing Ghyrson Starn, Kelermorph as the commander, the deck aims to apply early pressure and keep the opponent on the back foot. The inclusion of cards like Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning, and Forked Bolt allows for direct damage to the opponent's creatures or life total. Additionally, counterspells like Force of Will and Spell Pierce provide protection against opposing threats. Overall, the deck seeks to quickly close out the game through a combination of aggression and disruption, making it a powerful force in a Duel Commander 1 vs 1 format.

This deck focuses on utilizing the Enchantress archetype with Sythis, Harvest's Hand as the commander to draw cards and generate value by casting enchantment spells. The deck includes a variety of enchantments to control the battlefield and disrupt the opponent's strategy, while also ramping and fixing mana with cards like Utopia Sprawl, Burgeoning, and Wild Growth. With cards like Solitary Confinement and Swords to Plowshares for protection and removal, the deck aims to outvalue and outlast opponents in a 1 vs 1 Duel Commander format. The key strategy revolves around generating card advantage through enchantments and controlling the pace of the game with powerful enchantment-based effects.
